instructions: On the map, tap the location you want to share. Tap the Share button in the location card, then choose an option such as Messages or Mail. If you don t see the Share button , swipe up on the location card.
On the map, tap the location. Tap the Favorite button in the location card. If you don t see the Favorite button , swipe up on the location card.
Find a transit route , then tap Go. Tap a transit stop or station. Scroll to the bottom of the location card, then tap the Favorite button .
